chart.title: Population by level of education
chart.subtitle: Shown is the medium (SSP2) projection by the Wittgenstein Centre for Demography and Global Human Capital. The authors of this projection describe it as their "middle of the road scenario that can also be seen as the most likely path".

Population - Scenario: SSP2 - Sex: All -.descriptionShort: De facto population withpost_secondary education in a country or region.
Population - Scenario: SSP2 - Sex: All -.citationShort: Wittgenstein Centre (2024) – processed by Our World in Data
Population - Scenario: SSP2 - Sex: All -.citationLong: Wittgenstein Centre (2024) – processed by Our World in Data. “Post Secondary” [dataset]. Wittgenstein Centre, “Human Capital, Wittgenstein Centre 3” [original data].
